statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, category, available_quantity FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_price FROM equipment_inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Sports';
SELECT equipment_name, rental_price FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, category, available_quantity, rental_price FROM equipment_inventory WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, SUM(available_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM equipment_inventory GROUP BY category HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_price FROM equipment_inventory WHERE rental_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Lawn%' AND category = 'Outdoor' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, available_quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT rental_id, customer_name, rental_date FROM rental_history ORDER BY rental_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, rental_price FROM equipment_inventory WHERE rental_price < 100;
SELECT * FROM rental_history WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, rental_price FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC, rental_price ASC
SELECT rental_id, customer_name, equipment_name, rental_date, return_date FROM rental_history WHERE return_date IS NULL ORDER BY rental_date DESC

SELECT rental_id, equipment_name, customer_name FROM rental_history RH JOIN equipment_inventory EI ON RH.equipment_id = EI.equipment_id WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY rental_id ASC

SELECT RH.rental_id, customer_name, equipment_name, quantity, rental_price FROM rental_history RH JOIN equipment_inventory EI ON RH.equipment_id = EI.equipment_id WHERE RH.return_date IS NULL ORDER BY quantity DESC, rental_price DESC

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(rental_id) AS total_rentals, AVG(rental_price) AS avg_rental_price FROM rental_history RH JOIN equipment_inventory EI ON RH.equipment_id = EI.equipment_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_rentals > 3 ORDER BY avg_rental_price DESC
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_id, name, price FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM Equipment WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM Rentals WHERE rental_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT equipment_id, name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name, c.email, r.rental_date FROM Customers c JOIN Rentals r ON c.customer_id = r.rental_id WHERE r.return_date IS NULL;
SELECT e.name, e.quantity, r.renter_name, r.rental_date FROM Equipment e JOIN Rentals r ON e.equipment_id = r.equipment_id WHERE e.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY r.rental_date ASC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, e.name AS equipment_name, r.rental_date AS start_date, r.return_date AS end_date FROM Customers c JOIN Rentals r ON c.customer_id = r.rental_id JOIN Equipment e ON r.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE r.return_date > '2021-03-15';
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM equipment_categories;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_id, rental_date, return_date FROM rental_records WHERE rental_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT rental_id, equipment_id, rental_date FROM rental_records WHERE rental_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM equipment_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_price FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT rental_id, total_rental_fee FROM rentals WHERE total_rental_fee > 100 ORDER BY total_rental_fee DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_name, rental_price, quantity FROM equipment WHERE rental_price < 100 ORDER BY rental_price DESC;
SELECT rental_fee, rental_date, return_date FROM rental_transactions WHERE rental_fee > 50 ORDER BY rental_fee ASC;
SELECT reviews.review_id, rentals.rental_id, rating, review_text, review_date FROM reviews JOIN rentals ON reviews.rental_id = rentals.rental_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
